Rulings.Edison:
While the ① is applying, players cannot:
● Pay costs by sending a monster(s) to the GY
(Brionac's effect cannot be activated by discarding a monster).
● Pay costs by sending an unknown card(s) to the GY
(Jowgen, Card Trooper, Celestia, Hidden Armory cannot be activated, as they send to the GY to pay a cost).

While the ① is applying, players can:
● Discard monster cards. 
(Swap Frog can discard a monster to summon itself, as it does not specify "to the GY").
● Send cards to the GY by card effect 
(Foolish burial can be activated. The sent monster is banished)
(Ryko's effect can be activated, as it sends to the GY as an effect. Any monsters sent this way are banished).
● Tribute, Fusion, Ritual, Synchro Summon 
(Materials/Tributes are banished instead).
Rulings.Tengu:
(1) Any monster sent to the GY is removed from play instead.
●The (1) Continuous-like Effect only affects Monster Cards that would be sent to the GY.
●Face-down monsters that would be sent to the GY are also removed from play.
●Cards/effects whose cost send/discard a monster(s) 'to the GY' CANNOT activate.
●Examples: Herald of Orange Light, Card Trooper, and Jowgen the Spiritualist.
●Cards/effects whose cost send/discard a monster(s) CAN activate.
●Example: Magic Jammer, Dark Grepher.
●Cards/effects that send/discard a monster(s) 'to the GY' at resolution CAN activate.
●Examples: Foolish Burial, Blaze Accelerator, and Needlebug Nest.
●VS. Archlord Kristya: If a face-up Kristya would be sent from the field to the GY (and removed from play), its effect will still trigger and places it back on top of the Deck.

Rulings.Cat:
● While “Dimensional Fissure” is applying, a monster that is destroyed while face-down will still be removed from play face-up.
● Since Monster Cards are removed from play instead of going to the GY, you can't send “Horus the Black Flame Dragon LV6” to the GY to activate its effect to level up.
● If you also have 'Gravekeeper's Servant' applying, your opponent can't declare an attack.

Rulings.Stein:
● While “Dimensional Fissure” is applying, a monster that is destroyed while face-down will still be removed from play face-up.
● Since Monster Cards are removed from play instead of going to the GY, you can't not send “Horus the Black Flame Dragon LV6” to the GY to activate its effect to level up.
Rulings.Base: 1. While "Dimensional Fissure" is active, a monster that is destroyed while face-down will still be removed from play face-up.\n2. Since Monster Cards are removed from play instead of going to the GY, you cannot send "Horus the Black Flame Dragon LV6" to the GY to activate its effect to level up.\n3. If you also have "Gravekeeper's Servant" active on the field, your opponent cannot declare an attack.

PSCT.Edison: ① Any monster sent to the GY is banished instead.
